EACSettings.name: EACSettings
EACSettings.label: E A C Settings
EACSettings.description: Represents EACSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableEACForEveryonePref.description: enable E A C For Everyone Pref field of EACSettings metadata component.

enableInboxActivitySharing.description: enable Inbox Activity Sharing field of EACSettings metadata component.

enableInsightsInTimeline.description: enable Insights In Timeline field of EACSettings metadata component.
